name: Leviathan: Elementals
description:
In a world inhabited by humans, gods, and monsters alike, one man tries to unleash the forces of chaos upon the world. It is up to the Great Four; elemental guardian deities, to stop this threat and restore balance. However, other malevolent forces have their own plans in store...

An engaging turn-based game with lots of exploration and features! Take the time to explore, and learn about the world these characters live in, and perhaps even learn of the gravity of their current situation

But be warned...You are being hunted..
